FuncDef: This command configures a member of a GMPLS tunnel group. A member of a GMPLS tunnel group is a GMPLS LSP. All members of a tunnel group must have the same bandwidth. Up to 16 members may be configured for each GMPLS tunnel group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the identifier of the GMPLS tunnel group member. Values-1 to 16.
